item.description:
it's been WAY to long since i've been in the water, between getting injured and having to have my car worked on. time for me to get back in the water.

Let's meet at the surfing bagel co. at salisbury beach, lessons and rentals available to those who want them.

Costs:

SUP rental: $30
surfboard rental (no lesson): $25
surfing lesson (w/ rental): $40

or bring your own gear and meet up with us to surf!

Please specify in your RSVP if you will be needing:
1) surfboard rental
2) SUP rental
3) surf lesson
4) got my own gear

I am closing RSVP's Friday at noon so I can call the shop to let them know what we will need.

* I am scheduling this one for Salisbury beach because they have a wicked fun reggae band that plays on Sundays at 4pm - so I thought maybe after a fun session in the water we could hear some good music for anyone who is interested in sticking around for a little bit.
item.name: surf/sup sunday
